title: Woman wins $100K lottery prize with numbers picked from ChatGPT
description: A woman in Michigan turned to artificial intelligence to help her win a big lottery prize.
content:
WYANDOTTE, Mich. (Gray News) – A woman in Michigan turned to artificial intelligence to help her win a big lottery prize.

title: Florida law targets using AI to ‘nudify’ people’s photos
description: A sweeping new Florida law that took effect Oct. 1 makes it illegal to produce sexual images of a person using artificial intelligence or similar technologies without their permission.
content:
A sweeping new Florida law that took effect Oct. 1 makes it illegal to produce sexual images of a person using artificial intelligence or similar technologies without their permission.

title: Gen Z workers need AI to speak to colleagues, study finds
description: Britons aged between 16 and 28 are too scared to speak to their colleagues without the help of artificial intelligence (AI), according to new research shared exclusively with the Daily Mail.
content:
Almost half of Gen Z workers are too scared to speak to their colleagues without the help of artificial intelligence (AI), new research has found.
Britons aged between 16 and 28 say they feel more comfortable talking to chatbots than their co-workers... [2902 chars]

title: Big Tech is paying millions to train teachers on AI, in a push to bring chatbots into classrooms
description: The country’s largest teachers unions are teaming up with tech companies like Microsoft and OpenAI to help educators build literacy in artificial intelligence
content:
SAN ANTONIO (AP) — On a scorching hot Saturday in San Antonio, dozens of teachers traded a day off for a glimpse of the future. The topic of the day’s workshop: enhancing instruction with artificial intelligence.

title: UK TV channel deploys AI host for current affairs doc
description: A British television channel became the latest from around the world to use an artificial intelligence (AI) presenter, in a program airing Monday about the emergent technology’s growing impact.
